attributes.action: Against the law to text whilst on the move, vehicle or walking
attributes.additional_details: I propose that the use of Mobile Phone Texting at any time other than standing still is against the law.  I know the government has already supposedly made it against the law to use it in a moving vehicle.  I am finding more and more, on a daily basis,  I have to take avoiding action because someone is walking towards me whilst texting.
